## Ingredients

8 Jalapenos
16 Bacon Slices
16 T Cream Cheese
8 oz cheddar cheese, sliced

## Instructions

1.    Wash the Jalapenos and cut in half, discard stems
2.    Hollow out the center of the Jalapenos
3.    Put 1T of cream cheese in each Jalapeno
4.    Place one slice of cheese on each unit
5.    Wrap with a piece of bacon
6.    Bake at 400 degrees until done. Broil for crispness
